documentation.text:
@title Airdrop Distribution Contract
 @dev Contract for distributing airdrop tokens to eligible recipients.

@dev Constructor to initialize the airdrop contract with a maximum limit.
 @param airdropLimit Maximum allowed tokens for airdrop.

@dev Get the maximum allowed tokens for airdrop.
 @return Maximum allowed tokens for airdrop.

@dev Function to update the total Transfers for a account.
 @param addr Address of the recipient.

devdoc.details: Contract for distributing airdrop tokens to eligible recipients.

claimAirdrop(address).details: Function to check if a recipient can claim the airdrop and perform the claim.

returns._0: Whether the airdrop claim was successful.

constructor.details: Constructor to initialize the airdrop contract with a maximum limit.
